models.name: Aurora 2
models.title: Convergence of Cyriss Supernal Coalition Warcaster

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Convergence]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Convergence non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Repairable
characterabilities.description: This model can be targeted with Repair special actions as if it were a construct model.

feat.name: Starstrike Calibration
feat.description: Aurora and friendly Faction models with Flight beginning their activation in Aurora's Control range gain +2 SPD. Additionally, while in Aurora's Control range, friendly Faction models with Flight gain +2 to damage rolls against enemy models without Flight. Starstrike Calibration lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Apparition
execution.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

topability.name: Battle Directives
topability.description: At any time during its activation, this model can use one of the following directives:

subabilities.name: Ascension Command
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly models with Flight gain Blast Resistance and Flying High. Ascension Command lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Phantom Protocol
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly models with Flight gain Dodge and Reposition [5"]. Phantom Protocol lasts for one round.

subabilities.name: Suppression Initiative
subabilities.description: While in this model's command range, friendly living or construct models with Flight gain Dual Attack. Suppression Initiative lasts for one turn.

ability.name: Free Fall
ability.description: When an enemy model with Flight is hit by this attack it becomes knocked down and loses Flight for one round.

ability.name: Free Fall
ability.description: When an enemy model with Flight is hit by this attack it becomes knocked down and loses Flight for one round.

spells.name: Arcane Propulsion
spells.description: Target non-huge based warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement, +2 DEF and Flight.

spells.name: Bladed Gale
spells.description: Models hit lose Flight for one round.

spells.name: Hand of Destruction
spells.description: Friendly models in this model's battlegroup gain an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls against target model/unit. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spells.name: Spirit Door
spells.description: Choose a model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. Immediately place that model completely within 2" of the spellcaster. If the chosen model is the spellcaster, immediately place it completely within 2" of another model in its battlegroup that was in its Control Range at the time the spell was cast. A model cannot advance or attack after being placed by Spirit Door this turn.

models.name: Aurora 1
models.title: Convergence of Cyriss Supernal Coalition Warcaster

characterabilities.name: Apparition
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, warp this model anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Convergence of Cyriss]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Convergence of Cyriss non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Apparition]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Apparition. (During your Control Phase, a model with Appartion can warp anywhere completely within 2" of its current location.)

characterabilities.name: Flank [Angel]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Angel model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.name: Eleventh Hour
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in Aurora's Control range gain Resposition [5”] and Unstoppable. Eleventh Hour lasts for one turn. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [5”] can advance up to 5”. Then its activation ends.)

execution.name: Flying High
execution.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

ability.name: Mechanikal Seizure
ability.description: When a warjack is hit by this weapon, it becomes Stationary for one round.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Aerogenesis
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models/units beginning their activations in its Control range gain +2 SPD and Flight during their activations. Aerogenesis lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Arcane Might
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction non-Leader warrior models can spend 1 focus or fury point on the spellcaster to boost a melee accuracy or melee damage roll during their activations.

spells.name: Bladed Gale
spells.description: Models hit lose Flight for one round.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

models.name: Locke 1
models.title: Convergence of Cyriss Crucible Guard Ord Supernal Coalition Warcaster

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Convergence and Crucible Guard]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Convergence and Crucible Guard non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [True Strike]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain True Strike. (When this model damages a warjack or warbeast with a melee attack, choose which column or branch suffers the damage.)

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Ord, Supernal Coalition]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Convergence of Cyriss, Crucible Guard, Ord, Supernal Coalition armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Repair [d3+3] (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG 1". Target friendly Faction construct model. If the model is in range, remove d3+3 damage point from it.

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

feat.name: Arcanodynamic Catalysis
feat.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi in Locke's Control range immediately expire. For one round, when an enemy model is forced, casts a spell, or spends 1 or more essence, focus or fury points while in Locke's Control range, you can place one catalytic token on a model in Locke's battlegroup currently in her Control range. If a model casts a spell by spending essence, focus or fury, Arcanodynamic Catalysis triggers only once. A model cannot have more than three catalytic tokens on it at any time. A model gains +1 DEF and +1 ARM for each catalytic token on it. The weapons of a model with one or more catalytic tokens gain Damage Type: Arcane. Remove one catalytic token from each affected model at the end of its activation.

execution.name: Field Marshal [Cutting Edge]
execution.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Cutting Edge. (When a warjack with Cutting Edge is allocated 1 or more focus points while within its controller’s command range, it is allocated 1 additional focus point. )

ability.name: Critical Knockdown
ability.description: On a critical hit, the model hit becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Bombshell
spells.description: On a critical hit, models hit are thrown d6" directly away from the attacker. Roll distance once for all models affected. Models thrown do not deviate. Move models farthest from the attacker first. Instead of suffering blast damage, models hit but not directly hit suffer a POW 10 damage roll. The POW of collateral damage is 10.

spells.name: Engine of Destruction
spells.description: The Spellcaster gains +2 SPD, +4 MAT and +4 to melee attack damage rolls for one turn.

spells.name: Jackhammer
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup immediately makes one basic melee attack.

spells.name: Redline
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 SPD and +2 to melee attack damage rolls and can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus. At the end of each of its activations, the affected warjack suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Road To War
spells.description: When a friendly Faction model in the spellcaster's Control Range destroys one or more enemy models with a melee or ranged attack during its activation, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range can advance up to 3". A warjack can advance as a result of Road to War only once per turn.

spells.name: Sentry
spells.description: Target friendly Faction gains Rapid Fire. (A model with Rapid Fire can make one basic ranged attack during your Maintenance Phase.).

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Unyielding]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Unyielding. (A model with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.)

characterabilities.name: Hyper-Aggressive
characterabilities.description: When this model suffers damage from an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, after the attack is resolved it can immediately make a full advance directly toward the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Retaliatory Strike
characterabilities.description: If a model with Retaliatory Strike is hit by a melee attack made by an enemy model during your opponent's turn, after that attack is resolved the model with Retaliatory Strike can immediately make one basic melee attack against that model. The model with Retaliatory Strike can make only one Retaliatory Strike per turn.

characterabilities.name: Unyielding
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.

feat.name: Circumpotence
feat.description: While in Axis' Control range, enemy models suffer -2 SPD and STR and cannot charge or make slam or trample power attacks. Additionally Friendly Faction models currently in Axis' Control range gain +2 SPD and STR. Circumpotence lasts for One round.

execution.name: Reaction leads to Action
execution.description: If Axis hits the same model with an Action & Reaction intial attack, after resolving the attacks, Axis can immediately Smite that model. (The target is slammed d6” directly away from this model and suffers a damage roll with POW equal to the STR of this model plus the POW of the weapon. The POW of the collateral damage is equal to the STR of this model.)

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Double Strike
ability.description: This model can spend focus/fury to make two additional attacks with this weapon for each focus/fury point spent.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

ability.name: Double Strike
ability.description: This model can spend focus/fury to make two additional attacks with this weapon for each focus/fury point spent.

spells.name: Battering Ram
spells.description: An enemy model hit by Battering Ram can be pushed 3" directly away from the spell's point of Origin.

spells.name: Iron Aggression
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack in the spellcaster's battle group can run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks without spending focus and gains boosted melee attack rolls.

spells.name: Onslaught
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction models beginning their activations in its Control Range gain Relentless Charge for one turn. (While advancing as part of a charge, a model with Relentless Charge gains Pathfinder.

spells.name: Razor Wind
spells.description: On a critical hit on a warjack or warbeast, fill in the unmarked damage boxes or circles on the last column or branch damaged.

spells.name: Unstoppable Force
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup gain Bulldoze. Unstoppable Force lasts for one turn. (When a model with Bulldoze is B2B with an enemy model during its Normal Movement, it can push that model up to 2” directly away from it. A model can be pushed by Bulldoze only once per turn. Bulldoze has no effect when a model makes a trample power attack.)

characterabilities.name: Configuration
characterabilities.description: At the start of each of this model's activations, it gains +2 MAT, RAT or ATT until the start of its next activation.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Reposition [3”]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3”]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3” can advance up to 3”, then it's activation ends.)

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

feat.name: Oblivion Configuration
feat.description: Friendly Faction models gain an additional die on accuracy rolls against enemy models in Orion's Control range that have no essence, focus or fury points, and they gain an additional die on damage rolls against enemy models in Orion's Control range that have 1 or more essence, focus or fury points. Oblivion Configuration lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Force Mastery
execution.description: This model cannot become knocked down does not suffer collateral damage. While in this models control range, freindly faction models gain Resistance: Blast. When an enemy AOE range attack deviates from a point of orrigin within this model's Control range, after the deviation distance is rolled you choose the deviation direction.

ability.name: Polarize
ability.description: If this attack directly hits an enemy model, before resolving damage immediately push models within 2” of the model hit 2” directly away or directly toward the model hit in the order you choose.

ability.name: Knockdown
ability.description: When a model is hit by an attack with this weapon, it becomes knocked down.

spells.name: Force of Vengeance
spells.description: If one or more friendly Faction warrior models were damaged by enemy attacks while in the spellcaster's Control range during your opponent's last turn, during your Maintenance Phase one model in the spellcaster's battlegroup in its Control range can advance 3” and make one basic attack.

spells.name: Forced Induction
spells.description: Target warjack gains 1 focus point. Then the warjack and enemy models within 1” for each focus point on it suffer an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. When Forced Induction targets an enemy model, it is an offensive spell and requires a magic accuracy roll.

spells.name: Mage Sight
spells.description: Place a 5" AOE completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While a model is within the AOE, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup ignore forests and cloud effects when drawing LOS to it and ignore Stealth when attacking it.

spells.name: Magic Bullet
spells.description: If target friendly Faction model's next normal ranged attack directly hits, after resolving the attack choose a model within 4" of the model hit. The chosen model suffers an unboostable POW 12 arcane damage roll. The point of origin for this damage is the model hit. After resolving this damage roll, Magic Bullet expires. Magic Bullet lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Spellpiercer
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, the weapons of friendly Faction models/units gain Blessed and Damage Type: Arcane. Spellpiercer lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: A Father's Guidance
characterabilities.description: When a friendly faction model/unit chooses a Variable at the start of its activation inside this model's Control, it may choose both options.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Shield Guard]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Shield Guard. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

feat.name: Clockwork Reinforcement
feat.description: While within Lucant's Control range, friendly Faction models gain +4 ARM. When a friendly Faction model in Lucant's Control range makes a Repair special action, add +2 to the damage removed. Clockwork Reinforcement lasts for one round.

ability.name: Stall
ability.description: A warjack hit by this weapon becomes stationary for one round.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

spells.name: Discontinuity
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, the melee weapons of models in its battlegroup gain Dispel. (When a weapon with Dispel hits a model/unit, upkeep spells and animi on that model/unit immediately expire.)

spells.name: Dissolution Bolt
spells.description: A model hit by Dissolution Bolt cannot channel spells for one round.

spells.name: Positive Charge
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warjack gains +2 to melee attack and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee attack and melee damage rolls. Positive Charge lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Watcher
spells.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair
characterabilities.description: During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Empower (★Action)
characterabilities.description: RNG CMD. Target friendly Faction warjack. If the target warjack is in the range and it was suffering Disruption, it is no longer disrupted. The warjack also gains 1 focus point.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Auto-Repair]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Auto-Repair. (During your Control Phase, remove d3 damage points from this model.)

characterabilities.name: Resourceful
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

feat.name: Technological Superiority
feat.description: Warjacks in Syntherion's battlegroup beginning their activations in his Control range can charge without spending focus and gain an additional die on their accuracy rolls. Technological Superiority lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Anatomical Precision
execution.description: When this model's melee damage roll fails to exceed the ARM of a living model hit, that model suffers 1 damage point. A model disabled by a melee attack made by this model cannot make a Tough Roll.

spells.name: Convection
spells.description: When Convection destroys a living enemy model, you can give 1 focus point to a warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range.

spells.name: Hot Shot
spells.description: Target model in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains boosted ranged attack damage rolls.

spells.name: Magnetic Hold
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 SPD and DEF and cannot charge or make slam or trample power attacks. Friendly Faction construct models charging an affected model gain +2” movement.

spells.name: Reconstruct
spells.description: When target large-based or smaller warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup is disabled by an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, place it anywhere completely within 3" of its current location. Remove 1 damage point from each system, then Reconstruction expires.

spells.name: Synergy
spells.description: When in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in this model's battlegroup gain a +1 cumulative bonus on melee accuracy and melee damage rolls for each other model in the battlegroup that hit an enemy model with a melee attack this turn while in the spellcaster's Control Range. The cumulative bonus cannot exceed +3.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Arc Node]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Arc Node.

characterabilities.name: Launch Servitor
characterabilities.description: During your Maintenance Phase, you can place one Servitor solo into play completely within 2" of this model.

characterabilities.name: Soul Vessel
characterabilities.description: This model generates soul tokens as if it were a living model.

feat.name: Mathematical Perfection
feat.description: The base MAT and RAT of friendly faction models in Directrix's Control Range are each equal to her current ARC stat for one turn.

execution.name: Carapace
execution.description: This model gains +4 ARM against ranged attack damage rolls.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Backlash
spells.description: When target enemy warjack that is part of a battlegroup is damaged, its controller suffers 1 damage point.

spells.name: Domination
spells.description: Take Control of target enemy warjack that has a non-crippled cortex. You can make a full advance with the warjack and can then make one basic attack, then Domination expires. The enemy warjack cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement. Domination can be cast only once per activation. A warjack can be affected by Domination only once per turn.

spells.name: Facilitate
spells.description: While in this spellcaster's Control range, friendly Faction models' RAT becomes equal to the Spellcaster's RAT.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Shrapnel Swarm
spells.description: On a direct hit against an enemy model, center a 4” AOE on the model hit. After resolving the damage roll, models in the AOE are hit and suffer 1 point of damage and suffer -2 ARM for 1 Round.

spells.name: Tactical Supremacy
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition [3"] can advance up to 3", then its activation ends.).

characterabilities.name: Alternative History
characterabilities.description: This model is not allowed in competitive play events.

characterabilities.name: Arcane Accumulator
characterabilities.description: When another model is in this model's Control Range casts a spell, this model gains one power token. This model can have up to three power tokens at any time. After this model replenishes its focus during your next Control Phase, replace each power token with 1 focus point.

characterabilities.name: Field Marshal [Hyper Inductive]
characterabilities.description: Cohort models in this model's battlegroup gain Hyper Inductive.

characterabilities.name: Focus Matrix
characterabilities.description: This model can allocate focus during its activation. Once per turn during its activation, you can remove focus from warjacks in this model's battlegroup that are in its Control Range and give those focus to this model. This model cannot have more focus than its ARC as a result of Focus Matrix.

characterabilities.name: Perfection
characterabilities.description: This model can upkeep spells without spending focus. Enemy spells, feats and special rules cannot cause this model's upkeep spells to expire.

feat.name: Static Barrier
feat.description: Friendly Faction models currently in Nemo's Control rage gain Repulsor FIeld and Plasma Nimbus for one round. (When a model with Repulsor Field is hit with a melee attack, after the attack is resolved, the attacking model is pushed 1” directly away from the model with Repulsor FIeld.) (When a model with Plasma Nimbus is hit by a melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved, you can choose to have the attacking model suffer a POW 10 electrical damage roll unless the model with Plasma Nimbus was destroyed or removed from play by the attack.)

execution.name: Let an Old Man Rest
execution.description: "If there were no thunder, men would have little fear of lightning.".

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

ability.name: Feedback
ability.description: If this weapon damages a warjack that is part of a battlegroup, the warjack's controller suffers 1 damage point.

ability.name: Tractor Field
ability.description: This attack causes no damage. Warjacks hit suffer -4 DEF and cannot run, charge, or make slam or trample power attacks for one round. Additionally, Electric damage rolls targeting a warjack hit with Tractor Field gain +2 damage. Tractor Field lasts for one round.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.description: A model hit by Chain Lightning suffers a POW 10 electrical damage roll, and lightning arcs from the model hit to d3 consecutive additional models unless that model has resistance: electricity. The lightning arcs to the nearest model it has not already arced to within 4" of the last model it arced to ignoring models with resistance: electricity ignoring this model. Each model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Chain Lightning damage rolls are simultaneous.

spells.name: Fail-Safe
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 ARM and does not suffer the effects of crippled systems.

spells.name: Lightning Shroud
spells.description: Target warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup gains +2 to Melee Damage rolls and Resistance: Electricity, and its melee weapons gain Electro Leap. (When a model is hit by a basic attack made with a weapon with Electro Leap, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: electricity. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 electrical damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.).

spells.name: Lightning Tendrils
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Magnetic Field
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, models in its battlegroup cannot become knocked down, cannot be warped or pushed, and cannot be moved by a slam.

spells.name: Polarity Shield
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Polarity Field. Models are not affected while out of formation. (A model with Polarity Field cannot be charged or slam power attacked by a model beginning the charge or slam in its front arc.).

spells.name: Storm Fall
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' ranged weapons gain +2 RNG and Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.name: Salvage
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys an enemy cohort model with a melee attack, remove d3+3 damage points from this model or another model in its battlegroup. If the destroyed model is a Super Heavy or Colossal or Gargantuan, remove d3+6 damage points instead.

ability.name: Ground Pounder (★Attack)
ability.description: Place a 4" AOE anywhere completely within this weapon's RNG in this model's LOS. This model makes one ranged attack roll against each model in the AOE, ignoring concealment, Cover, Stealth and Elevation. This model does not gain a bonus for aiming when resolving a Ground Pounder attack. Models do not gain the target in melee DEF bonus when resolving Ground Pounder attack rolls. Models hit suffer a ranged attack damage roll with a POW equal to the POW of this weapon. Ground Pounder attacks are simultaneous.

ability.name: Assimilation
ability.description: When this model destroys an enemy construct model with this weapon, immediately after the attack is resolved remove d3 damage points from this model.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

characterabilities.name: Steady
characterabilities.description: This model cannot become knocked down.

ability.name: Arcing Fire
ability.description: When attacking with this weapon, this model can ignore intervening models except those within 1" of the target.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essence to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Bombardment
subabilities.description: Models hit suffer a POW 8 blast damage roll.

subabilities.name: Crater
subabilities.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

subabilities.name: Flare
subabilities.description: Models hit by an attack with Flare lose Stealth and cannot gain Stealth and suffer -2 DEF for one round.

ability.name: Critical Armor-Piercing
ability.description: On a critical hit, when calculating damage from this weapon, halve the base ARM stats of the model hit.

ability.name: Critical Sustained Attack
ability.description: On a critical hit during this model's activation, when it makes an attack with this weapon against the last model hit by the weapon this activation, the attack automatically hits.

characterabilities.name: Hand of Vengeance
characterabilities.description: When one or more friendly Faction warrior models are destroyed or removed from play by enemy attacks while within 5” of this model, this model gains +2 on Melee accuracy and Melee damage rolls for one round.

characterabilities.name: Shield Guard
characterabilities.description: When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have this model directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.

characterabilities.name: Sturdy

characterabilities.description: Choose one enemy model or unit with ambush that has not yet been put into play. Its controller must immediately deploy the chosen model or unit. This ability can only be used once per game.

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Prey]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Prey. (After deployment but before the first player's turn, choose an enemy model/unit to be this model/unit's prey. A model with Prey gains +2 to attack and damage rolls against its prey. When the prey is destroyed or removed from play, choose another model/unit to be the prey.)

characterabilities.name: Tactics [Take Down]
characterabilities.description: Models in this unit gain Take Down. (Models disabled by a melee attack made by a model with Take Down cannot make a Tough roll. Models boxed by a melee attack made by this model are removed from play.)

characterabilities.description: This model can make one additional melee attack each Combat Action.

ability.name: Batter
ability.description: When an enemy model is hit by this weapon during this model's activation, it becomes knocked down and can be pushed 1” directly away from this model. If the model hit is pushed, this model can immediately advance 1” directly toward it.

ability.name: Beat Back
ability.description: Immediately after a basic attack with a weapon with Beat Back is resolved during this model's Combat Action, the enemy model hit can be pushed 1" directly away from the attacking model. After the enemy model is pushed, the attacking model can advance up to 1" directly toward it.

characterabilities.name: Auto-Repair

characterabilities.name: Evasive
characterabilities.description: When this model is hit by an enemy ranged attack, immediately after the attack is resolved this model can advance up to 2".

characterabilities.name: Flying High
characterabilities.description: Ranged attacks targeting this model with a RNG greater than 8 suffers -3 RNG to a minimum of 8. Friendly models can advance through this model if they have enough movement to move completely past its base. This model loses Flying High if it loses Flight.

characterabilities.name: Gun Platform
characterabilities.description: This model can make ranged attacks even while in melee and can target models outside of melee.

ability.name: Crater
ability.description: On a direct hit, models hit suffer -2 SPD for one round.

characterabilities.name: Bottom Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [any army]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for any army.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.

characterabilities.name: Top Floor [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: The upper level of this structure is considered to be elevated terrain. Additionally, models on the Top Floor gain Snipe. Spells cast from the Top Floor gain +4 RNG.
